item.description:
When
Friday, February 1, 2008 at 7:45 PM 20080202T004500Z
Where
ZANDRI's Stillwood Inn
1074 South Colony Road Rte 5 Next to Vinneys Garden Stuff
Wallingford , CT 06492

Info/Map
Who should come
Those who like to dance or just get out after a long winter.. Its among old and new friends...

Why
Its EXCERSIZE...the more you dance..the better in shape you get, the better you look, the better chance you will meet a decent person.. who is also in shpe or getting in shape..and you wont meet someone if you never GET OUT and MEET NEW PEOPLE.

How to find the organizer(s)
"Look for the MEETUP signs on one of the tables far away from the speakers."
--AL-R -

Details
Hi Everyone,
I have been to this place before for the Halloweene Party, its a nice place,
I enjoyed the company of at least 10 or so people that night at our table, so it isnt that far and all attendies felt the same way, but its ok, some may not want to travel that far when drinking...dont drink so much LOL..

UPDATE:
For those who have not been dancing or have some fear or something like that..this is a good environment.

I hope a few more persons from this group and any new members get over the fear that its a bad place or something..
This kind of dance is pretty well attended by regular people...but its so safe, ya dont have to dance with anyone you don't want to..and there are known people there for added safety and interaction.. at the table or out on the floor..
We choose places so conversation can be had when not dancing or when you find someone interesting to talk to..

Debbie from the Professional Womans Group is going to list this event on her Meetup also
check out her site..:

http://women.meetup.c....

And i also am listing it on my other site..

http://friends.meetup...


Ok Getting There:

Directions to ZANDRI'S STILLWOOD INN

1074 S. Colony Rd., (Rte. 5), Wallingford, CT

It isnt that far..........its all highway and one exit..and a simple right turn..


From I-91 N or S: Exit 13. Right at light at end of ramp onto S. Colony Rd. (Rte. 5). Stillwood Inn is 800 ft. on right, just past Vinny's Garden Center.


From Merritt Pkwy Northbound: Exit 63. Turn right off exit onto Rte. 22 E. Left at 2nd light onto Washington Ave. (Rte. 5N). Follow for 3 miles. Stillwood Inn is on right, just past Vinny's Garden Center.


1074 S. Colony Rd. (Route 5), WALLINGFORD, CT
Huge Ballroom Accommodates 400+ Singles

Connecticut's Largest Dance Floor
Dancing to DJ's Top 40/Soft Rock

Dinner Buffet 8-9:30 Coffee/Dessert at 11:30

Dress to Impress/No Jeans $20 Admission
Fri., Feb. 1 8 pm - 12:30 am
For this event, because tables have to be reserved/or seating/ i cant reserve for maybe people..and its really not fair to those attending either. Have you ever gone to a place and had some butt say those are reserved and no one ever sits there... Ok you know why i dont like it either..

I really enjoy these kind of dances...

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the MEETUP SIGNS ON THE TABLE>>>

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Waiting to go Kayaking ? .Not yet..Here is something else to do in the Meantime
